title: CDA chairman inaugurates new library at CDA Model School
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 13 (APP): Capital Development Authority Chairman Captain (Retd) Anwaar ul Haq on Wednesday inaugurated a new library at CDA Model School, featuring a substantial collection of quality books for children to enjoy reading.
The chairman, accompanied by the school’s principal and teachers, awarded prizes to the top-performing students, who had won the inter-house declamation contest.
During the event, the chairman conveyed his contentment with the performance of CDA Model School and issued directives to further improve the school’s results.
He instructed the relevant authorities to compile a thorough report proposing strategies for elevating the school’s standards.
Additionally, the chairman toured various classrooms, engaging with students through questions to evaluate their knowledge and skills. He committed to providing facilities to the school and encouraged the school management to prioritize achieving favorable academic results.
